document.description: This fast-food restaurant lures diners with the promise of fresh ingredients and a ... No place better for a dashboard buffet with plenty of room to open your car ...

June 20, 2012 Taj - The Flavor By Urban Tulsa Weekly So when your senses are summoned and the only things that will appease are the faraway spices and textures of Indian... Full review 3.5/5.0 Chick-fil-A By Citysearch This fast-food restaurant lures diners with the promise of fresh ingredients and a dependable menu. The marquee... Full review 4.0/5.0 Fuddruckers By Citysearch Red-shirted, black-bibbed attendants serve grilled burgers made from freshly ground beef, turkey, salmon, and even... Full review
Diner reviews
Fast Food
July 11, 2012 Chef's Coney Connection Very Nice Place by JR ( 420 reviews ) I stopped in for lunch today and ordered three chili cheese dogs with extra onions. The dogs are among the best in the area and I'm looking forward to try out some other menu items. The employee's were nice and friendly. The dining area was very clean and neat. The only bad thing is their location, it's on the side of a strip shopping center and doesn’t face the street for better visibility. July 1, 2012 Taco Bueno Flat food by Rick ( 817 reviews ) Chicken tacos were flat, boring, little flavor. The chips and queso were bad--cheese had an odd flavor--have had better out of a jar. June 30, 2012 Schlotzsky's Deli Very Satisfied by JR ( 420 reviews ) I ordered the"Original Turkey"sandwich along with chips and a drink. I'm not big on sandwiches but I will stop by at Schlotzsky's and devour one of theirs. It was a very good meal, the employee's were nice and the dining area was clean.
